Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Peter Billie
Dear Sir,
Peter Billie shouldn't play at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .154 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Stephen Fort
Dear Sir,
Stephen Fort isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .237, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Marcus Sheridan

Regards,
Scouting Director
